"( Fiat Chairman) John Elkann and Sergio Marchionne have confirmed to the government the intention of pursuing the Italian group's development objectives," Silvio Berlusconi 's office said in a statement on Saturday after the meeting. The government acknowledges positively the intentions shown by the company as well as its role on the global market.
